text.section:
A real estate appraiser trainee shall:
keep separate experience logs for each supervising appraiser;
sign appraisal reports that the real estate appraiser trainee prepares; and
upon request, provide experience logs to the Commission.
A real estate appraiser trainee may have more than one supervising appraiser.
A real estate appraiser trainee may obtain copies of appraisal reports which were prepared by that trainee from the supervising appraiser.
An appraiser trainee is subject to the uniform standards of professional appraisal practice.
